NAME: ACCOUNT SECURITY
INCLUDES: ACCOUNT SECURITY, ANTI-FRAUD, DETECT MALWARE, VERIFY ACTIVITY, VERIFY IDENTITY, FACIAL RECOGNITION

NAME: ADVERTISING
INCLUDES: IMPROVE ADS, MEASURE AD PERFORMANCE, PERSONALIZE ADS, PROVIDE ADS, SPONSORED CONTENT, THIRD PARTY ADVERTISING

NAME: ANALYTICS
INCLUDES: ALGORITHMS, MEASURE PERFORMANCE, PROCESSING SEARCH TERMS

NAME: COMPANY OPERATIONS
INCLUDES: AUDITING, CONNECTING ACROSS PRODUCTS/DEVICES, CUSTOMER SERVICE, FINANCIAL TRANSACTIONS, LEGAL COMPLIANCE, MAINTAINING PRODUCTS/SERVICES, TRACKING OUTAGES

NAME: IMPROVE PRODUCTS
INCLUDES: IMPROVE APPLICATIONS, IMPROVE CONTENT, IMPROVE PRODUCTS/SERVICES, IMPROVE STORES

NAME: LEARN USERS' BEHAVIOR
INCLUDES: LEARN FROM USERS, UNDERSTAND CUSTOMER BEHAVIOR

NAME: PRODUCT SAFETY
INCLUDES: DETECT SUSPICIOUS CONTENT, DETECT/PREVENT SPAM, INVESTIGATE VIOLATIONS, LOSS PREVENTION, NETWORK SECURITY, PREVENT HARM, PROTECT SERVICES, PROTECT USERS/PUBLIC

NAME: PROVIDE SERVICES
INCLUDES: APPLICATIONS, PROVIDE CONTENT, PROVIDE FEATURES, PROVIDE PRODUCTS, PROVIDE SEARCH RESULTS, PROVIDE SERVICES, PURCHASES, SUGGESTIONS/RECOMMENDATIONS, FACIAL RECOGNITION

NAME: RESEARCH AND DEVELOPMENT
INCLUDES: NEW PRODUCTS/SERVICES, RESEARCH AND INNOVATE FOR SOCIAL GOOD, SURVEYS, TECHNOLOGICAL ADVANCEMENT, TEST PRODUCTS/SERVICES

NAME: THIRD PARTY
INCLUDES: ADVERTISERS, AFFILIATED BUSINESSES AND PARTNERS, APIS, THIRD PARTY APPLICATIONS, CONTENT CREATORS, DATA PROVIDERS, DOMAIN ADMINISTRATORS, GOVERNMENT AND LAW ENFORCEMENT, MEASUREMENT PARTNERS, MERCHANTS/VENDORS, NEW OWNER, REGULATORS, RESEARCHERS/ACADEMICS, SERVICE PROVIDERS/CARRIERS, WEBSITES

NAME: ACCOUNT INFORMATION
INCLUDES: USER PROVIDED INFORMATION, CONTACT INFORMATION (PHONE NUMBER, EMAIL ADDRESSES), CONTACT LIST, ADDITIONAL ACCOUNTS, CONNECTED ACCOUNTS, ACCOUNT TYPE (PERSONAL, BUSINESS)

NAME: APP INFORMATION
INCLUDES: USE OF OTHER APPLICATIONS, APP NAMES, APP TYPES

NAME: BEHAVIOR ON DEVICES
INCLUDES: SCROLLING, MOUSE MOVEMENTS, CLICKSTREAM, CLICKS/TAPS, BROWSER DATA, REFERRER URL, SESSION INFORMATION, WINDOW PLACEMENT, OTHER DEVICE USE

NAME: CALL/MESSAGE METADATA
INCLUDES: CALLING PARTY NUMBER, RECEIVING PARTY NUMBER, FORWARDING NUMBERS, TIME OF CALLS, DATE OF CALLS, TIME OF MESSAGES, DATE OF MESSAGES, DURATION OF CALLS, ROUTING INFORMATION, TYPES OF CALLS

NAME: CAMERA INFORMATION
INCLUDES: CAMERA SETTINGS, CAMERA TYPE, VISUAL DATA THROUGH CAMERA VIEWFINDER

NAME: DEVICE IDENTIFIERS
INCLUDES: APP IDS, DEVICE IDS , FAMILY DEVICE IDS

NAME: DEVICE INFORMATION
INCLUDES: BATTERY LEVEL, DEVICE TYPE (PHONE, COMPUTER), HARDWARE VERSION, OPERATING PLATFORM/SYSTEM, SOFTWARE VERSIONS, SYSTEM ACTIVITY, STORAGE SPACE, OTHER DEVICE INFORMATION

NAME: DEVICE SIGNALS
INCLUDES: BLUETOOTH SIGNALS, SIGNAL STRENGTH, WI-FI SIGNAL

NAME: FILE INFORMATION
INCLUDES: FILE NAMES, FILE TYPES, STORAGE SPACE

NAME: NETWORK INFORMATION
INCLUDES: COOKIES AND COOKIE DATA, DOWNLOAD & CRASH ERRORS, PAGE RESPONSE TIMES, CONNECTION SPEED, DEVICE NETWORK, NEARBY DEVICES, WI-FI ACCESS POINT DATA

NAME: NON-PERSONAL DATA
INCLUDES: CONTACT PREFERENCES, INFORMATION ABOUT OTHER USERS OF YOUR ACCOUNT, INFORMATION ABOUT THIRD PARTIES YOU INTERACT WITH, POTENTIAL CUSTOMERS, CUSTOMER LISTS

NAME: PRODUCT USE
INCLUDES: CONTENT VIEWS/INTERACTIONS, CLICKS/TAPS, BROWSING HISTORY, SCROLLING

NAME: FEATURES USE
INCLUDES: VOICE AND AUDIO INFORMATION, LOCATION DATA ("FIND MY," DIRECTIONS), INTERACTIONS WITH OTHER USERS, LIKES, HASHTAGS, GROUPS, ENGAGES, VIEWS

NAME: ACTIVE STATUS
INCLUDES: CURRENT USE, LAST USE, TIME, FREQUENCY, DURATION OF ACTIONS

NAME: CONTENT CREATED/UPLOADED
INCLUDES: PHOTOS, VIDEOS, TEXT, EMAILS SENT/RECEIVED, MESSAGES

NAME: PUBLIC DATA
INCLUDES: PUBLIC PROFILE PICTURE, PUBLIC CONTENT, REVIEWS, NEWSPAPER ARTICLES, LEGAL PROCEEDINGS, VOTER INFORMATION, COURT RECORDS, PROPERTY RECORDS, MARRIAGE CERTIFICATES, DEATH CERTIFICATES, OTHER PUBLICLY AVAILABLE DATA

NAME: USER'S CONTACT INFORMATION
INCLUDES: E-MAIL ADDRESS, HOME ADDRESS, PHONE NUMBER, SHIPPING ADDRESS
